text: Prothan ir'Vemel is a powerful and influential [[warlord|Karrnathi warlord]] of [[Karrnath]]. Notably, he is a [[Seeker|Blood of Vol]] [[paladin]] and [[bone knight]] whose body is permanently grafted to his skeletal armor. Unlike his colleagues [[Charl ir'Loran]] and [[Renn ir'Tanar]], Prothan genuinely supports King [[Kaius|Kaius ir'Wynarn III]] in his efforts toward peacemaking.
title: Prothan ir'Vemel
tags: [[Karrnathi warlord]] humanoid Karrnath human [[bone knight]] paladin
